template.template: Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native
template.name: Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native

item.name: VMware Tools Sync Time With Host

discovery_rule.name: Discover VMware Datastores on Virtual Machine
discovery_rule.description: Discover VMware datastores used by the Virtual Machine

item_prototype.name: Datastore "{#VSPHERE.VM.DATASTORE.NAME}" is used by Virtual Machine

discovery_rule.name: Filesystem Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of filesystems on a VMware Virtual Machine

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native:vpoller["vm.disk.get", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "{HOST.HOST}", "freeSpacePercentage", {#VSPHERE.VM.DISKPATH}].min(5)}<20
trigger_prototype.name: Less than 20% of free space on {#VSPHERE.VM.DISKPATH} at {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native:vpoller["vm.get", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "{HOST.HOST}", "summary.overallStatus", "null"].iregexp(red,5)}=1
trigger.name: Overall status of Virtual Machine {HOST.NAME} is {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native:vpoller["vm.get", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "{HOST.HOST}", "runtime.powerState", "null"].iregexp(poweredOff,5)}=1
trigger.name: Virtual Machine {HOST.NAME} is powered off

trigger.expression: {Template VMware vSphere Virtual Machine - vPoller Native:vpoller["vm.get", "{$VSPHERE.HOST}", "{HOST.HOST}", "guest.toolsRunningStatus", "null"].iregexp(guestToolsNotRunning,5)}=1
trigger.name: VMware Tools not running on {HOST.NAME}
